WorkItem.Description:
I like to use the optimizer for my Fury DPS Warrior but how can i tell him that i only have that weapon ONCE?
I had made several 2h weapons available for the optimizer but some of them i own only once. Optimizer will take it for main AND for offhand....
Â 
Is there a way so solve this? :)
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Optimizer takes a weapon 2 times, even if its only one time available

Comments.Message:
I just noticed that i can solve this with editing the items stats to "unique".
Imho it isnt a clean way but it solves it.

thanks and sorry.


/close
